title: Dr. Susan's Fabulous Vegan Cupcakes - Susan Richards
description:
If you love cupcakes, this is the ultimate book for you! Dr. Susan's Incredible Vegan Cupcakes are delicious, fun, and creative.

Susan Richards, M.D., one of the most acclaimed medical doctors in the field of alternative medicine, has loved baking since childhood. She has also spent years developing healthier and incredibly delicious vegan cupcake recipes. They are not only scrumptious to taste and fun to decorate but are also made from the healthiest and freshest ingredients.

Her cupcakes are all gluten-free, dairy-free and sugar free. To create a totally vegan cupcake, Dr. Susan even experimented with and found great egg substitutes that provides her cupcakes with a lightness and texture that is delectable!

She has divided the book into three sections. The first section, Healthy Ingredients, contains valuable information on the nutritious ingredients that she uses for her recipes as well as many helpful baking tips.

In the second section, How To Make Incredible Cupcakes, she shares with you many useful tips and techniques on how to make and decorate cupcakes. Dr. Susan even includes helpful information on decorative materials and how to choose healthier options. This section is invaluable in helping you to create the most delicious, beautiful and fun to make cupcakes.

The third section is the best of all! It contains all of her delicious and fun recipes for healthy vegan foundation ingredients, classic cupcakes, fancy cupcakes, cupcakes for special occasions, and fun cupcakes for kids.

The book is beautifully illustrated and includes dozens of gorgeous photos of all the cupcakes to assist you in their preparation and baking.

Dr. Susan's Incredible Vegan Cupcakes is a great book that you will return to often for years to come
